body.name: iP14 Pro Max Unlocked Smartphone for Android 11, 6.1" Unlocked Cell Phone, FHD Face ID 4GB 64GB 128GB Expansion, Dual SIM, 4000mAh, 8MP 16MP Dual Camera, T Mobile,for Verizon Supported(Dark Green)
features: Large Screen Smartphone: The unlocked phone adopts a 6.1in ultra high definition screen and an IPS high definition screen. Not only does it bring a wider visual experience, but it also has extraordinary vivid colors and amazing clarity, allowing you to explore every detail to maximize your viewing experience.

4000mAh Large Battery: The smartphones are equipped with an above average 4000mAh battery, which lasts longer than you expect, 6‑10 hours of talking, 8‑15 hours listening to music, 3‑5 hours playing games, and more. Smart and thoughtful AI battery management can reduce excessive cache to save more power, thus extending standby time.

Support System: Dual SIM unlock phone is equipped with the latest for Android 11 system, MTK6737 and up to 2.0GHz, using 12nm processor. The architecture runs multiple applications with enough fluidity and responsiveness to meet your productivity and entertainment needs.

High Pixels: 16MP rear camera and 8MP front camera, you can further edit your photos with filters, or other techniques, and face unlocking your phone only takes a second. Three in one navigation system, GPS, GLONASS, Beidou navigation, positioning is faster.

4G GSM Network Phone: This phone i14pro max provides 4G network, which can be connected with GSM network operators such as for T Mobile, for Verizon, for American Telephone and Telegraph Company, etc. i14Pro max always strives to provide reasonable mobile phones to our esteemed customers. (This paragraph of text is only applicable to the US, for other countries, please refer to the following network frequency band text).

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 2.8 2.8 out of 5 stars 43 ratings 2.8 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Please Read Before Purchase! Please Confrim Your SIM Card's Compatibility Before Purchasing! 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8 4G LTE:B2/B4/B5/B7/B12/B17/B20/B28A/B28B Hilitand iP13 Pro Max Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular! It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS, ...! Package List: 1 x Mobile Phone,1 x Protective Case,1 x Mobile Phone Film,1 x Adapter 1 x Data Cable,1 x Headphone,1 x Manual,1 x Card Pin

Technical Specifications OS: Latest Android 11 CPU: MTK6737 Ten Core 64-bit 1.8GHz Storage: 4GB RAM + 64GB ROM (upgradeable storage 128GB by SD/TF card) Screen: 6.26-inch HD+ Waterdrop Screen Camera: front camera 2MP, f2.0 aperture, fixed focus, rear camera 2MP (color, f1.8 aperture) Battery: 2550mAh SIM Card: Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1 Function: Face Recognition, with WIFI+BT+FM+GPS; Type C Charging Port, 3.5mm Standard Headphone Jack Global 2G and 3G frequency bands: You can take the iP14 Pro Max with you anywhere worldwide, as long as the area supports 2G, 3G and 4G(does not support Verizon and Sprint in US).

2550mAh high capacity battery, standby longer time. Hilitand iP14 Pro Max Phone is embedded with an above-average 2550mAh battery, which can continue to power you for a whole day of normal using. Charging equipment US special charging plug, micro USB. Adapter and USB cable are already included in the package. Ten Core Prozessor Equipped with a 12nm-class ten-core processor, efficiently and smoothly to power through most demands and matches the performance with the best power efficiency. iP13 Pro Max delivers a smooth gaming and viewing experience. With up to 4GB RAM and 64GB of internal storage, you can use multiple apps simultaneously and save more pictures, songs, and apps. Latest Android 11 Compared with the 10 system, the system operation speed has been upgraded by 20%. Powerful and smooth experience, new privacy protection mechanism for a better user experience to all.

Specification: Item Type: Smartphone Material: ABS and Glass Gross Weight: 400g / 14.1oz System: for Android 11 System Supported Language: Multi language support CPU: MTK6737 RAM: 4GB RAM and 64GB ROM(built in 64G memory card) Hard Disk: Small Memory Card Maximum Support 128G Display Screen: 6.1in Bluetooth: Support Touch Screen(resolution): LCD resolution 720 x 1520 IPS HD large screen I/O: Micro USB x 1 Approx.3.5mm / 0.1in headphone port x 1 Horn: Single Horn Vibration Motor: Support, Microphone: Support

WiFi: External high performance, low power consumption dual band 5G WiFi Network Standard: GSM850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G: WCDMA850, 1900, 2100MHz, 4G:B2.B4.B5.B7.B12.B17.B20.B28A.B28B, dual card dual standby Card Slot: Three Card Slots (a micro sim card, a nano sim card and a small memory card can be installed at the same time) Gravity Sensing: Supported Range Sensing: Supported GPS: Supported Camera: Front camera 8MP, f2.0 aperture, fixed focus, rear camera 16MP (color, f1.8 aperture) Battery Specification: 4000mah (inclusive) Type: lithium battery Charger(which country specifications are available): US Plug 100-240V Other Features: Face Unlock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nearly caught fire
reviews.reviewText: This phone had many issues. It did not have the memory that is advertised, fingerprint and facial recognition could be used by anyone, it almost caught fire, and did not allow to use an sd card for storage of any kind, not even photos or music.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: BUEN EQUIPO PERO NO ERA EL QUE YO QUERIA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Item was not any good
reviews.reviewText: Was not able to use it, not able to connect to phone company

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's definitely an awesome phone
reviews.reviewText: I just wasn't able to use it because my service provider does not support it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Couldn't get it activated
reviews.reviewText: This phone is an unlocked phone but Verizon , Total mobile and straight talk couldn't activate it. And I thought as long as a cellphone is unlocked you can use any service provider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Got charged twice
reviews.reviewText: I just bought this phone Friday and it just came in Wednesday. It looks good, it’s not broken or anything. It works but the payment for it went through yesterday and I got charged for it twice. I don’t what’s going on but this situation needs to be fixed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No lo compren
reviews.reviewText: No sirve el celular no duro un mes se apago y no volvió a prender

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I don't know about this one
reviews.reviewText: I got this fit my grandson but it has so much static that it's hard to understand the other party. I'm going to have to invest in him another phone because this one just is not good in a pinch.
Fue regalo para mi mamá ella feliz con el funcionamiento solo la pila no dura mucho
